DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Planning Target Volume Dose Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator relating to the planned target volume of treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Planning Target Volume Dose Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the planned target volume of treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: The precise outlining of an anatomic region for the purpose of delivering a high dose of radiotherapy to that concentrated area, and at the same time, minimizing the exposure and potential side effects of the adjacent tissues.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time. :The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A geometrical concept defined to select appropriate beam arrangements, taking into consideration the net effect of all possible geometrical variations, in order to ensure that the prescribed dose is actually absorbed in the clinical target volume.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
